title: METAL TOP 1000 PART 1-100
description:
METAL TOP 1000 PART 1-100 

Part 1 

The top of the hill. 
In fact, when looking at the top 100. I realize that I got almost nothing to add. Everything is in here.

NÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â°3, Continuo Renacer is an amazing spanish band, for incredible instrumental progressive riffing and harmonizing. Maybe a one shot, but fucking amazing.

NÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â°7 : DT : ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œpull me underÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, the beginning of prog metal... Feeling & musicianship, I already spoke ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‹Å“bout that. A definitive masterpiece for everyone, and should be too for the death metal fans. 
NÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â°8 : Meshuggah ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œElasticÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, the last track from ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…â€œChaosphereÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚ï¿½, that one was very easy to choose thanx to the finish of that song with the superposition of x lines (and maybe the superposition of three songs or three times the same one with a time delay, simply just the apocalypse after a long note close to a flat EEG. 
NÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â°9 : Metallica. What else ? 
NÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â°10 : Watchtower. One of the most huge revolution in thrash & technical metal. Just a masterpiece, close to the edge of that era, but though ahead of time.
And so on... 

Enjoy, listen... And SEED ! 

I hope you took a close look at everything, that you discovered fucking great bands that youÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ll follow, and that you took a second though about the true essence of metal (which is crossing boundaries, INTRA & INTER the limits and genres.
